ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantItemDetailActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantItemDetailActivity

  • public class ClaimantItemDetailActivity
extends Activity
    This ClaimantItemDetailActivity class is an extended class of Activity class. This class will control the interface of Item detail for claimant. This view displays Item details, and creates an option menu, including item's date, category, description, amount, and amount. It will be used when the claimant asks to access to the Item detail.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    android.os.Bundle, android.app.Activity, android.content.Intent, android.view.Menu, android.view.MenuItem, android.view.View, android.widget.TextView, android.widget.Toast
